ModMetaData.name: Hydroponic Hay
ModMetaData.author: TargetDrone
ModMetaData.description:
v1.4 Hydroponic Hay Allows Hay Grass to be cultivated in Hydroponics Basins
changelog: v1.0 first version v1.01 removed obsolete xml tag for compatibility with r17 v1.02 changed targetversion to 0.18.1722 v1.03 switched to xpath patching method to reduce chance of conflict with other mods... v1.04 changed to work with version 0.19.2009 v1.05 changed targetversion to 1.0.0 v1.06 ammended tags to use supportedVersions instead of old targetVersion v1.1 added multiversion support for 1.0 and 1.1 v1.2 added 1.2 compatibility v1.3 added 1.3 compatibility v1.4 added 1.4 compatibility
